TunableList.name: SURFACE_FAVORITES
TunableList.description: Tuning that specifies which favorite tag to search for when a Sim attempts to deploy a vehicle on a given surface. Example: Sim is in the water and wants to deploy a water vehicle. They have both an Aqua Zip and an Island Canoe, but only the Aqua Zip is the favorite. We want to ask the favorites tracker if a given favorite water vehicle has been set, which is based on the tag tuned here.

TunableEnum.name: Favorite Tag
TunableEnum.description: The favorite tag we search the inventory for when deploying vehicles.

TunableEnum.name: Surface
TunableEnum.description: The Surface we want to apply a favorite tag to. If the Sim is on this surface and has an opportunity to deploy a vehicle, then we use the corresponding tag to choose it.
